en.title: FE's Long Drive Golf Challenge KGSAAS, 29th October 2008.
en.content:
The 3rd leg of the FusionExcel Long Drive Challenge was another great success with over 1000 people once again attending the event. As we get closer to the finals the competition is hotting up for those valuable final spots.

KGSAAS was the venue for the first qualifying in the Klang Valley with people already queuing up by the time we kicked off at 9am. The leader board changed numerous times during the course of the day as there were people on the tee right up until close of registration.

The Golf Fair was much larger than Penang and Johor and the special offers from all the exhibitors put smiles on all the buyers faces.  The FE members that were there all benefited and at one stage we were not sure if it was a Pendant demo day or a long drive event with demos being performed at all corners of the event.

Final qualifying will be on Tuesday so the competition to make it through to the finals on Wednesday is expected to be exciting.
